Schedule

SATURDAY, AUGUST 18, 2018

11:00AM

Ceremony

The ceremony will take place outdoors on the patio next to the Lakeside Pavilion.

In case of inclement weather, the ceremony will be moved indoors within the hotel.

11:30AM

Cocktail Hour

Will take place at the same location as the ceremony

12:30 - 4:00PM

Reception

The reception will be in the Lakeside Pavilion. Lunch will be served, followed by dancing!

4:00PM - 5:30PM

Informal After-Party

We recognize a lot of friends and family will be traveling in from out of town, so we'd love to use this time to catch up with you guys! Come and hang out with us at the hotel bar. Food and drinks will not be provided.

Travel + Accomodations

O'Hare Airport (ORD)

Take Interstate 294 North. Interstate 294 North will become Interstate 94 North. Exit at Half Day Road and turn left. Travel approximately 2.0 miles to Milwaukee Avenue and turn left again.

At the first traffic light, turn left into the Lincolnshire Marriott Resort entrance on Marriott Drive. Please make sure you are turning into the Marriott entrance and not the entrance for the Courtyard hotel.

Midway Airport (MDW)

Travel 4.7 miles south on South Cicero Avenue toward West 59th Street. Turn right onto West 59th Street. Travel 3.3 miles and merge onto Interstate 294 North via the ramp to Wisconsin Partial Toll Road. Travel 38.0 miles and exit at Half Day Road. Travel approximately 2.0 miles to Milwaukee Avenue and turn left again.

At the first traffic light, turn left into the Lincolnshire Marriott Resort entrance on Marriott Drive. Please make sure you are turning into the Marriott entrance and not entrance for the Courtyard hotel.

Accomodations

Lincolnshire Marriott Resort - most convenient option, this is the same location as our wedding venue. They recently renovated their guest rooms as well. Click here to reserve a room in our block at $114/night.
